head.title: Honey, We Forgot to Raise the Kids!

hedline.hl1: Honey, We Forgot to Raise the Kids!

block.p: As a teenager, I am bothered that society is so quick to blame kids and teenagers for all the ills and annoyances of the world.
When I go out, as often as not it is adults who are the major annoyance, whether they are on their cellphones, having a loud conversation with others or even loudly disciplining their children.
As a teenager, I am bothered that society is so quick to blame kids and teenagers for all the ills and annoyances of the world.
When I go out, as often as not it is adults who are the major annoyance, whether they are on their cellphones, having a loud conversation with others or even loudly disciplining their children.

The best way for parents to teach their children to be polite and respectful is not just discipline but also providing a good model and being respectful themselves -- of other adults and, yes, even of youth.
That way, we are not only teaching good manners but also the valuable lesson that it is not all right to preach one thing and do another.
Stefan Muller Port Washington, N.Y. Nov. 27, 2005
